Posts.Content: Thanks for the advice hard as we do speak every day and that my daughter who is 2 misses her nanny but always speak to my Dad in the morning to see what sort of night she has had. She was feeling a little better but if she still feels bad in the morning she will call the hospital   Love reading posts on here such good information   Thanks Everyone xxx
Posts.Title: First FEC - Advice needed

Posts.Content: Hi Everyone my Mum had her first FEC today and it has hit her like a train. One she is having chemo and two she has cancer!!!   Can everyone tell me how they were following their first FEC and any tips for the sickness and tips for me for helping   Thanks Everyone xxxx
Posts.Title: First FEC - Advice needed

Posts.Content: My Mum has had her first T and that she can't eat and even finding it hard to drink due to the mouth thrush and ulcers. The doctor has given her something but its not really doing anything. Does anyone have any ideas which will help with relieving thrush and ulcers in the mouth? Laura xxx
Posts.Title: Thrush in the mouth and ulcers in the mouth

Posts.Content: Thanks everyone will get her to put them in the freeze xxx
